reviewText: I am not a woodworker but this was totally fascinating to watch.  Graham Blackburn should have his own television show!  Would be a great pairing with Antiques Roadshow.  So much information that you can use just looking around your own house.
Great fun and highly informative. I loved the piece on spindlemaking - I'd never seen a froe or an spokeshave before and now I feel like an expert. Bravo!
